Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 2 Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika » 2.2 Sahetukaduka, Kusalattika » 2.2.1 Kusalapada » 2.2.1.1--6 Paṭiccādivāra » Paccayacatukka
Hetu-ārammaṇa
Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika
Sahetukaduka, Kusalattika
Kusalapada
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
Hetu-ārammaṇa
1.
1243Sahetukaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
1244Sahetukaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko kusalo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
2.
1245Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ, anantare ekaṃ, samanantare ekaṃ, sahajāte ekaṃ, aññamaññe ekaṃ, nissaye ekaṃ, upanissaye ekaṃ, purejāte ekaṃ, āsevane ekaṃ, kamme ekaṃ, āhāre ekaṃ…pe…  avigate ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
